channel.title: A3 Artists Agency on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in A3 Artists Agency on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A3 Artists Agency Ex-Chairman Adam Bold Resolves Lawsuit Over Sale to Gersh
item.description: Former agency partners Robert Atterman and Brian Cho claimed that they were duped into signing away their rights to stop the deal by Bold, who allegedly sold the company below market value.
